quotes.quote: If you don’t have a vision you’re going to be stuck in what you know.  And the only thing you know is what you’ve already seen.
Vision without action is merely a dream. Action without vision just passes the time. Vision with action can change the world.
A vision is not just a picture of what could be; it is an appeal to our better selves, a call to become something more.
The only thing worse than being blind is having sight but no vision.
Vision is the art of seeing what is invisible to others.
Vision is the true creative rhythm.
The vision must be followed by the venture. It is not enough to stare up the steps - we must step up the stairs.
Vision without action is a daydream. Action with without vision is a nightmare.
Where there is no vision the people perish.
Vision without execution is hallucination.
Cherish your visions and your dreams as they are the children of your soul, the blueprints of your ultimate achievements.
Vision animates, inspires, transforms purpose into action.
Every person takes the limits of their own field of vision for the limits of the world.

It doesn't matter how fast you can go, it doesn't matter how much passion you have, and it doesn't matter how much energy you put into something. If you don't have a vision and clarity on the destination you want to reach, you'll simply never get there.

Vision gets the dreams started. Dreaming employs your God-given imagination to reinforce the vision. Both are part of something I believe is absolutely necessary to building the life of a champion, a winner, a person of high character who is consistently at the top of whatever game he or she is in.
Where there is no vision, the people won't follow. Vision for a better future is the great motivator.
The more boundless your vision, the more real you are.
Be brave enough to live the life of your dreams according to your vision and purpose instead of the expectations and opinions of others.
Hold the vision, trust the process.
It's not what the vision is, it's what the vision does.
The best vision is insight.
A clear vision, backed by definite plans, gives you a tremendous feeling of confidence and personal power.
Create a vision of what you want your future to look like, then set your goals and take action.
To have a vision for your life is to see where you could be, not where you are now.
Create a vision for the life you really want and then work relentlessly towards making it a reality.
Live your vision and demand your success.
